Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.queries.payloads.PayloadFunction

Packages that use PayloadFunction
Package
Description
org.apache.lucene.queries.payloads
The payloads package provides Query mechanisms for finding and using payloads.

  • Uses of PayloadFunction in org.apache.lucene.queries.payloads

    Subclasses of PayloadFunction in org.apache.lucene.queries.payloads
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AveragePayloadFunction
    Calculate the final score as the average score of all payloads seen.
    class 
    MaxPayloadFunction
    Returns the maximum payload score seen, else 1 if there are no payloads on the doc.
    class 
    MinPayloadFunction
    Calculates the minimum payload seen
    class 
    SumPayloadFunction
    Calculate the final score as the sum of scores of all payloads seen.
